## ✨ CSS Concepts

| Features           |                                      Link                                       |
| :----------------- | :-----------------------------------------------------------------------------: |
| Nesting            |           [CSS Nesting Module](https://drafts.csswg.org/css-nesting/)           |
| Container Queries  | [An Interactive Guide](https://ishadeed.com/article/css-container-query-guide/) |
| Popovers           |    [Popover API](https://developer.chrome.com/blog/introducing-popover-api)     |
| View Transitions   |   [Resources](https://github.com/schalkventer/css-view-transition-resources)    |
| Scroll Transitions |              [Examples](https://flackr.github.io/scroll-timeline/)              |

## ✨ Run it locally

To run the project, follow the steps bellow after cloning the repository:

```bash
# Install dependencies
npm install

# Run in production mode
npm run build

# Run local server
npm run dev
```
